main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Nashville, Tennessee on May 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as a very dark color and disc-shaped,The sighting lasted for 5-6 minutes,The object moved slowly through the sky with a flashing motion,It was observed at a bearing of 30 degrees from the south of Nashville,The report initially considered the object as a possible balloon but concluded it was likely not a balloon, but probably an aircraft.
